mapper.select: SELECT fb.BOARDNO, fb.TYPE, fb.TITLE, fb.CONTENTS, fb.ENDYN, CASE WHEN fb.ENDYN = 'Y' THEN DATE_FORMAT(fb.ENDTIME, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(fb.BEGINTIME, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(fb.ENDTIME, '%Y-%m-%d')) END AS eventTime, fi.BIZNAME FROM FOOD114_BOARD fb JOIN FOOD114_BIZ_INFO fi ON fb.USERID = fi.BIZID WHERE fi.BIZID = #{bizId}

SELECT B.*, CONCAT(F.FILEPATH, F.FILENAME) AS PATH, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(SETBEGINTIME,1,2),'시 ',SUBSTRING(SETBEGINTIME,3),'분') AS SEPASETBEGINTIME, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(SETENDTIME,1,2),'시 ',SUBSTRING(SETENDTIME,3),'분') AS SEPASETENDTIME, SUBSTRING(SETBEGINTIME,1,2) AS BEGINHOUR,SUBSTRING(SETBEGINTIME,3) AS BEGINMINUTE,SUBSTRING(SETENDTIME,1,2) AS ENDHOUR,SUBSTRING(SETENDTIME,3) AS ENDMINUTE, DATE_FORMAT(BEGINTIME,'%Y') AS BEGINYEAR,DATE_FORMAT(BEGINTIME,'%m') AS BEGINMONTH,DATE_FORMAT(BEGINTIME,'%d') AS BEGINDAY, DATE_FORMAT(ENDTIME,'%Y') AS ENDYEAR,DATE_FORMAT(ENDTIME,'%m') AS ENDMONTH,DATE_FORMAT(ENDTIME,'%d') AS ENDDAY FROM FOOD114_BOARD B LEFT JOIN FOOD114_BOARD_FILE F ON B.BOARDNO = F.BOARDNO WHERE B.USERID = #{bizId}
